description: This file is a React component defining the main home page of a notes management UI, handling state for notes and interactions such as create, delete, update, and view modes.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: React functional component serving as the main page for the notes application, managing notes state and user interactions.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Creates a new note with default title and updates the state accordingly.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes the currently active note and updates state to reflect removal.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Updates the active note with new data, optimistically updating UI and then syncing with API.
